hiveArticle.title: Color Challenge - Thursday Green - Leafs and Flowers
hiveArticle.body:
My today's post about the Color Challenge is flowers and leafs. They compliment each other so well that one would not look good without other. Have you seen any flower which looks good without the leafs or the other way round.

![IMG_20171126_130525.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmWsr2ot9PvQTLybkXEj3EXTzyGj2qEP9NxyUBtE7vTEBy/IMG_20171126_130525.jpg)

![IMG_20171126_124605.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSJXR8JKYyw6bFG4Zby82aPy1fssQ7TXb9pReHPR7qNiU/IMG_20171126_124605.jpg)
